input.sentences: the triathlon had runners and cyclists and rowers .
[male] had participated for the last 5 years .
a group of women started the race with a parade .
the boats were ready for the participants .
once the runners made it to the boats this river would be packed .
output.sentences: The triathlon runners were now rowers.
People who participated were typically males around 5 feet tall.
The women played drums and started the race.
Once everyone was ready the participants parked their boats.
The runners ran down the river stream until it was no longer packed.
